titlestmt.titleproper: Copies of items held by Inverness Royal Academy relating to John Baillie

did.unittitle: Copies of items held by Inverness Royal Academy relating to John Baillie

bioghist.p: John Baillie's secondary education was at Inverness Royal Academy.

scopecontent.p: Photograph of John Baillie, probably taken at the time of his graduation from the University of Edinburgh (c1908); programme for Inverness Royal Academy Second Annual Edinburgh Reunion (1907)

acqinfo.p: Copied from items on temporary loan from Robert Preece, Inverness Royal Academy, 31 May 2004.

originalsloc.p: Originals held by Inverness Royal Academy.

relatedmaterial.p: Papers of John Baillie & the Baillie family

controlaccess.subject: Photographs
controlaccess.persname: Baillie | John | 1886-1960 | Scottish theologian and ecumenical leader
